lead_paragraph: The deal, if completed, would end a yearlong impasse that has come to symbolize the health care plight of the country’s uninsured immigrants and the hospitals that end up caring for them.
snippet: The deal, if completed, would end a yearlong impasse that has come to symbolize the health care plight of the country’s uninsured immigrants and the hospitals that end up caring for them.

headline.main: Deal Would Provide Dialysis to Illegal Immigrants in Atlanta
headline.print_headline: Ailing and Illegal, but Now Hopeful
headline.sub: Deal Would Provide Dialysis to Patients of Shuttered Atlanta Clinic;

byline.original: By KEVIN SACK and CATRIN EINHORN
byline.contributor: Kevin Sack reported from Atlanta, and Catrin Einhorn from New York.
